content.p: QS World University Rankings logo 2022 QS Rankings place University of Nottingham 4th in the UK for Nursing. The University of Nottingham is now ranked 25th in the world and 4th in the UK, for Nursing, placing it ahead of Edinburgh and 12 places higher than in 2022. Head of School, Professor Jo Lymn, said: “This is great news and highlights the growing reputation we have as a School for excellence in teaching and research. Our staff are focused on delivering cutting edge research and scholarship to enhance the student experience and improve the lives of individuals and communities, locally, nationally and internationally. Being ranked 4th in the UK is fantastic recognition of the dedication of our staff.” B236, Medical School Queen's Medical Centre Nottingham, NG7 2HA telephone: +44 (0)115 95 15559 email: mhssupport@nottingham.ac.uk
